title: Holiday Stories #14
description:
Marc L Abbott, Ashley Ward, Kevin Allison, Joy Gabriel and Sean David Christensen share seasonal tales in our annual winter holidays special for 2021.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Klaus Nomi, Marc L Abbott, Red Simpson, Santa Cloud, Ashley Ward, Dolly Parton, Cyndi Lauper, Jingle Cats, Joy Gabriel, The Reverend Glen Armstrong, Sharon Jones, the Dap-Kings, mattlikestapes, Linda Bennett, Sean David Christensen, Kevin Allison)
